title: Constant Lag and Disconnecting
body:
GOOD FUCKING JOB. I can't even play the game because your CLIENT FAILED TO TELL ME THERE WAS AN UPDATE

So I go into game with average ping BUT i can't move. and when I do I DISCONNECT.

I couldn't even hover over a team fight because when I move cam, I DISCONNECT. When I finally get to the damn team fight, I DISCONNECT.

Don't tell me, "oh it's just your internet", no FUCK you. Your client told me there was an update after the 3RD fucking time I restarted the damn thing. AFTER THE 3RD TIME. Why didn't it tell me the first time?

Seriously I didn't start having internet issues until you guys moved HQ back in patch 5.20.

Here's my speed just so you ELIMINATE my connection being the reason.

32mbs down       28mbs up

You guys must REALLY want me demoted and reported for afk because your game broke on my pc.

You do not understand how fucking LIVID I am

replies.body: Even with those internet speeds, it doesn't necessarily mean that you won't have problems connecting to certain servers. Moreover, you wouldn't have been able to get into a game without patching, not to mention we didn't release a patch over the weekend, so what you most likely saw was the client trying to *repair* the most recent patch. Let that repair go through, double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure the patch was able to download correctly and let me know if you keep getting disconnected.

Here. https://streamable.com/ygg4j

I decided not to record the 10 "attempting to reconnect" scenarios  just trying to get out the damn fountain
This is pretty much what's happening to me with my normal ping. -_-

If you have a WiFi config, thats the problem. WiFi and league aren't aren't stable at all. All game actions are 40KB that need to be uploaded and downloaded. The ult and utilities are about 50-150KB.

Although sometimes you can just stand still and an enemy player can use an ability in bush and lag you out and you won't know what happened until after you died or they stopped using abilities
But the weird thing is it will work perfect for my first game, and then it starts doing this the next game.
Thats a PC issue. Turn off super fetch

I turned it off and it's still doing the same thing. 
In game, the timer is still moving, but the gold isn't moving. I can't cast any abilities or hit anything, but I can run around. When I try to buy something in the shop, it buys it for 2 seconds and puts it back. 
Also, i'm seeing there was a patch but my client never decided to patch. Like i'm watching my team mates for example, this morg is perma recalling and running around all over the map. 

Do I just need to reinstall or something?
This has been going on for just about 2 weeks and I think I tried almost everything. n__n"
It's just stressful because I put a lot of time and money into this game.

Ahaaa so that actually looks a lot like packet loss. Hit up this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with the logs from that game and take a screenshot of what it says for me.

Here's an added note to those logs. My internet speeds weren't getting affected. Just connection to league servers. I monitor my speeds while I play and so far this is the only game I have issues with

It's pretty hard to see those logs with how they're formatted, but go ahead and take those and shoot them over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They've got a few steps they can take you through to see what's all going on.

I checked the r3dlog files and it seems the game can't load effects. Alot of games files are missing like textures and effect texures. it can't even load most ini or scripts. So whatever the newest patch or small update did it really messed up the game

Yea it's starting to sound more and more like the patcher was attempting to repair a corrupted patch. I'd suggest grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) at this point and running a **Force Repatch** to see if that clears this up. If not, wait for those tech guys in your ticket.

Thing is, the game never did that. Not once in this situation did it attempt to repair. If you check the log is just commented about it's in every log. There's always errors. The dev team really needs to check their own files out. I check a file as far back as 2015 with similar results

I will. You can zoom in though

This is the line thats not completely visible

[time], [address], [incoming], [outgoing], [app_ctos], [app_stoc], [loss], [sent], [ping], [variance], [reliable delayed], [unreliable delayed], [app update delayed], [Time spent in critical section (frame)], [Latency in Window], [Packet Loss % in Window], [Jitter in Window], [Overall Latency Min], [Overall Latency Max], [Latency Min in Window], [Latency Maxin Window], [Latency packet Samples], [Jitter Packet Samples]

Ranked game (Biggest netlog)

All ranked game netlogs from the game I couldnt play at all

No no no dont try to pass that "trying to repair" bs with me. I straight up said the league client needs to restart so it can update

It didnt say anything near trying to go back to an older version or anything of the sort. If anything they client asked to get into my console and change a few things which is VERY ODD.
give me a sec, ima post a link to a video i just recorded showing whats going on in game. Btw your HQ change added 40+ ping so im even lucky to playing without d/c until this point
150mb down 90 up and i still lag like jfc why, riot please fix it already .... plus that I can stream full hd without lagging but league still disconnects me lol. why
Shit man, even I can stream this game WITH NO PING INCREASE. But whats going on right now is just stupid
They need WAY more QA testers since their servers can easily become unreliable except when they live 10ft away from their server room
